origin.reincarnation-origins.phoenix.des: The Legendary Bird of Fire. Majestic and Powerful.
power.reincarnation-origins.phoenix/asce: Propel yourself through the air using your stored gunpowder! Less destructive than other abilities. Also replenishes some flight stamina.
power.reincarnation-origins.phoenix/erup: Explode yourself, the more stored powder the large the explosion. (Damages terrain and nearby entities)
power.reincarnation-origins.phoenix/expl: Consuming Gunpowder refills your explosion meter.
You do not take damage from explosions.
power.reincarnation-origins.phoenix/fire: Throw out a giant bomb that explodes after a short time.
power.reincarnation-origins.phoenix/flig: Flying reduces your stamina, land to replenish it. If you run out you will fall slower and not take fall damage. However, you will have to wait for the bar to refill before flying again.
power.reincarnation-origins.phoenix/fuel: Store gunpowder to fuel your abilities.
power.reincarnation-origins.phoenix/heli: When under direct sunlight, you receive a speed boost on land and in the air. You also slowly generate powder for your stores.
power.reincarnation-origins.phoenix/inge: You're able turn most mobs into explosive ingredients. They will occasionally drop additional gunpowder or other goodies.
power.reincarnation-origins.phoenix/rebi: Upon death, revert to your Rebirth Form in a massive explosion.
power.reincarnation-origins.phoenix/tast: While holding a tnt in your offhand you slowly gain food. Crouch and stay still to ponder the beautiful explosive, gaining additional sustenance. Watch out for stray sparks.
power.reincarnation-origins.phoenix/wate: Water slows you down and stops your abilities from igniting.
power.reincarnation-origins.phoenix/wing: You have wings! You can fly, but nothing else will fit on your back.
power.reincarnation-origins.phoenix_rebi: You are immune to fire damage.
You're just a little guy. You slow faller, jump higher, and have better control in the air.
You will slowly return to your True Form provided you are directly under the sun. Standing in the rain or in water will reduce progress towards Rejuvenating.
While sneaking and not moving, you will gain progress towards Rejuvenating, regardless of there being sunlight or not.
While standing in the sun you gain progress toward Rejuvenating. Standing in Rain or Water will leech this progress.
You're just a little guy. You're one block tall and you only have five hearts.
You have wings! But you must ascend before you can fly.
reincarnation-origins.advancements.phoen: You now know what it means to be reborn. Gain additional health in Ascended Form.
Heal yourself right out of your boots!
Feed off the magic of an enchanted book!
Really ponder an enchanted book to get all that tasty magic!
(Eat? Drink?) Consume a bottle of honey.
origin.reincarnation-origins.phoenix_reb: The smaller alternate form of the Phoenix. This form is more fragile but more resilient to water. Sit in the sun to return to your Ascended Form.
reincarnation-origins.advancements.phoen: Take a moment to §nsit§r (and enjoy the view.)
Have your power leached by rain or water.
Start your journey back to your Ascended Form
reincarnation-origins.phoenix.error.too_: You are too tired to fly! Sneak to fall faster.
